lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see any survivors?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Not yet, but there are two sentinels and they are guarding something. I'm hoping that's someone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps we can create a little bit of a lure to bring back that single fellow closer to us and we dispatch him quietly.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's not a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reached into the ball bearings that I have left since I have about half. I take one and go-- (ball bearing bouncing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down along to the grade? (ball bearing bouncing) Eventually, you can no longer hear any noise the ball bearing makes as it continues out of your earshot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not leading the way. The closest one is actually ten feet behind us like a choo-choo train back behind the group so that it's dim light 20 to 30 feet ahead of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any indication that anything noticed or heard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, shit! He's stupid!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's real good at dispatching them quiet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, do you want to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't make me do this again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tell you what, if you summon some courage, I'll come with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Could I give her some guidance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may if you are going to try to stealth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, what does that mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just give you a little bit of boost, you know.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I got a really good feeling about what you're about to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Like a really good feeling. Like the kind of feeling that will put a big smile on your face, you know, take you back home, make you feel like there's a big--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not interested in a relationship right now.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, this isn't working at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Offer her shiny things.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Ah, you know what? You know the way this is turning out, I feel like you can get all kinds of gold and silver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! Pretty things. Sure, yes!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, absolutely. Give me something.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh well, it's waiting for you just down the hall. All you got to do is take care of a creature quietly and quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel inspired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so make your stealth check and add a d4 to whatever you roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I give you a Blessing of the Trickster for your stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you roll the same thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but not much better. Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, low rolls at both?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus the d4?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, d4. Sorry, not a four, but d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. It's just Nott? You're going as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you begin to make your way down the hall carefully, ever so carefully, about 60 or 70 feet towards the bottom where you can both see the grade begin to turn up. Fjord, you discover why you stopped hearing the ball bearing, as suddenly you take a step and your foot slides up from under you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and catch yourself and you manage to do so, but you dislodge a rock that begins making more noise than the ball bearing did. At which point you hear (growls and howl)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just the rock that began to make its way down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I screwed the pooch. I think y'all need to fucking join us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't hear you, you're fucking 60 feet ahead of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go down the tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come back to us please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we go to them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already sent the message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we sticking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said "Come back to us." I feel like we're already here, we should just-- oh gods. What do we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's take them on. I feel like I've never felt. You and me, let's take them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure, I feel inspired again. I'll take a swig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do take a heavy swig off of your flask, thank you. Both wait carefully holding your action until underneath you can see what emerges below the lowest part of the curving tunnel roof, a gnoll snout begins to protrude past. You can see the arrow already nocked in the longbow as it turns down and turns and glances up the tunnel to meet your guys' vision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As soon as he fires, I will as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will fire, my hand-- how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now he's about 30 feet below you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I can make that shot. (ping!) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just hits. Misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 is the magic number.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I say my bonus I move my Hex over to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, your Hex has faded.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you guys hadn't left before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tried it. 20 up, 20 down that side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, had you guys taken a short rest when you were up there or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was hoping so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we did say we were going to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then it would add another hour up there, wouldn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would. It's up to you guys. It may or may not affect things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't really get anything back on short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would get my ki point back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would get a spell back, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should. We rescued the survivors, we gave them a little moment to grieve.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean there might be more survivors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We rescued some survivors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We say

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We took a rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so before we jump into this, we'll say you took the short rest, which is an hour, so you guys can use your hit dice. You hadn't taken any damage, Shakäste, so you don't have to worry about it.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No but I was just thinking about-- because I did use the Thunderwave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not come back on a short rest.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That does not come back, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (background music)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, shitty rolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way to track the hit dice in (singing) D&D Beyond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, under hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You hit short rest and it will pop up the number of hit dice you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's under the short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, under short rest, not hit--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so, with that the case, you've taken a short rest. Now back to the current moment. You both fired. You missed, you succeeded to hit, go ahead and roll your damage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. 1d10 plus four. That is a ten plus four, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage, all righty. As it looks up and gets hit in the snout and it looks back up and you can see the black, charred exterior of its head, one of its eyes is now ruined and he (growls). Its tongue is dangling out. You can see blood and slobber across the front of its chest as it looks up and gets ready to release its bow strike at you since you made the hit. That's going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 18. That's an eight on the die, that is ten points of piercing damage to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Damn, damn, damn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was watching this, I was going to head down this direction anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys get another round as well as the gnoll, so go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage. No sneak attack, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Damage on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's five points of necrotic.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Is my Guidance still helping at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Guidance only helps for the next six seconds, so it helped him with the stealth check originally. You can do it whenever you want to as an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight points of damage, five necrotic for 13 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the gnoll pulling back its arrows, about to give out a large bellowing cry, makes a large inhale as it pulls back a second arrow and then both of you slam into it and watch as it falls to the ground, dropping its weapons that clatter against the stonework. It's not longer moving as you guys catch up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go running past them right as they do it and cut its ears off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm opening up the jar. There you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull it back into the tunnel!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh okay. I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You drag it back in, while you're down you make perception checks, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her forearms are amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're helping yeah, both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're bats, just baseball bats with arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush down and grab the body, you glance up and whereas previously he described there was the singular gnoll and the two other skeletal ones in the opposite side, it appears that since it was given some indication of nearby sounds and it made that brief call before it began to approach, there are a few more gnolls that have appeared at the top of the platform above where the stairs crest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they do not at the moment, but only because they're not looking at your direction. As soon as you see it you immediately drag the body out of the way. I would like you both make a stealth check to try to quietly drag the body back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both don't drag it, you both grab an arm and a leg and very painfully lift it up without making any sound and pull it out of range up the grade out of view as you watch one of the gnolls turns its face in your direction barely passing seeing you guys yank it out of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) There's a lot more guys out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw three visually appear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw three visually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Beau and her ball bearings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you drop a ball bearing down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god this means that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a motion simulator ride. Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fun fact, Matt's house is actually made of Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every wall, the kitchen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just Dwarven Forge all the way through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You haven't lived until you've slept on Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or our bed's not on braziers, no.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Critical Role, Critical Role.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god, we've got to stop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, this has to end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This leads into the grade that head up in an angle here where you guys originally shot the gnoll and dragged him out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are down that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are over--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up in the tunnel here. It angles down there and this is where--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. They're coming. (whispering) They were about to look in this direction, but they weren't quite looking in that direction when we dragged the body out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Okay.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: They're not exactly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They haven't noticed anything yet. You guys are up in this way, and this is the layout here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, what do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do anything yet. We have to figure out what we're doing.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Should we use something to distract them? Since they're already not looking our way, so that we could get a few shots at their back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you send the Grand Duchess in?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I absolutely will. Can we start there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's do that. Find a safe perch, my dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Grand Duchess makes her way down to the tunnel up. Let's see if they see her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she really royalty?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's what she told me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she used to be a person and you shrunk her down?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, she is who she is, baby. Just like you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She passes them over. There is one perch up on the side of the wall right above where this large pit is on the opposite end. She perches right over the side as two of the gnolls are still (growls). One of them begins to look over the table and underneath for any possible source of the noise earlier. One of them glances over his shoulder as the Duchess enters, begins to pull an arrow out of the quiver.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Come back here, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bird noise). (growl).

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! It's on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Thaumaturgy. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action just before this happens and I'm going to activate the second sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you reduce your max hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I roll to maintain concentration because he hit me after I cast Hex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, please. Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. Yeah, that's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, no, that's a failure. You lose Hex, sorry buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to be honest with him.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Thaumaturgy. Can I brighten the room? How dark is it in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pitch black aside from the globes of light that he has. There's nothing to make brighter in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's bright behind us, not in front of us so much.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see, then, if it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can shake the ground, though.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes, let's shake the ground so however well he thinks he can aim takes him off kilter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For that instance, make a standard wisdom check for me. Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier which I think is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a 19 natural roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel the Duchess return to you and just past the vision as the Duchess passes over you hear the sound of the fingers gliding across the bowstring. You hear the creak of the wood as it's pulled back. You know exactly what that sound means as you see through the Duchess's eyes. You focus on the ground below and cause it to quake somewhat. Rolled a natural five plus four, with that shaking it causes the-- it's very localized in the area, the gnoll (yip) as it does, it releases the arrow and it whips past and shatters across the rock. The Duchess returns to your shoulder.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, now I'm pissed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they know we're here now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He saw the bird come back this way so maybe--

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: It's just a bird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He might have even thought it was a bat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we all turn into birds and confuse him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know how to do that?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: I could try.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's try later. Why don't we do things we've done before? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we doing this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fucking go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go in or-- this doesn't seem very smart! I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rub her head and give her a little blessing. Don't you worry. You keep hiding whenever you need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this blessing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It gives you advantage on stealth checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If this is the case, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we get a surprise round?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they know we're here.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, they

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or an earthquake. We're in a shaft! Things shake a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first gnoll announced there was something fishy. They don't know what it is or where you are, but they're on guard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Surprised is like a condition. Like poison, but they know something is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not surprised.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: If I used Sacred Flame on one-- because if it's dark in there and one of them burst into flames wouldn't they all look in that direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's try that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could Sacred Flame him in the exact same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While we're waiting, can I cast Armor of Agathys on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hissing sound) I pull the moisture out of the air and it forms frost all over me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a little moss on it from the cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you have this conversation you turn back and you watch as Fjord, the rather handsome looking half-orc, finishes muttering something under his breath and the shadows coalesce into this dark, cold, icy armor that shatter into bits of shards around the exterior of his leather armor. You watch as this mist rises off of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody chill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you ruined it! It was so good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It wasn't cool when Arnold said it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay frosty? Stay frosty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull my sickle out so I'm prepared for actual up-front combat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got both of those sticks going. I'm ready for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's moved forward to here. This guy's moved forward to there. They're in the process of searching the area, looking down the tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one do you want to hit? The orange one, the gray one, or the black one?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Did we see those other ones over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw them, the skeletal ones there.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's what I thought. I thought my baby saw them. I say, I think we need to get those fellows to turn back and look at those fellows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't see those guys to Sacred Flame them.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I can't see them anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are up in this tower right now, so you'd have to send Duchess back in to see.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Isn't that always the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could get the one in the back, and then the other two might look at him.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think that's a great idea, darling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I say, I change my mind every five minutes about whether this group was a good idea or a terrible idea, and I'm listening to these chuckleheads talk to each other, and I'm waiting to cast Blur on myself when it looks like everybody's going to do something, but I'm waiting until the last minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew it was Blur!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good for you. You get a doughnut.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sacred Flame, on the gentleman in blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the same time I see his little reed flick, I'm going to swirl my sickle around and cast Toll the Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, on this guy there?

lines.name: LAURA, KHARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slowly bring your way to the base-- which in order to get you in the space where you can see them, that would put both of you rushing right down to the base in that area. If I can get a marching order to where the rest of you are, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'll be in the back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a line of the three of us, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I'm good with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys rush forward to take the line as they--

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Linemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be back with Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I knew what that meant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You going to be a guard or a tackle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Tackle. I'm probably a guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all rush in below, you both release Sacred Flame and Toll the Dead on the guy in the blue. That's a wisdom saving throw for Sacred Flame, I believe it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a dex save for Sacred Flame and a wisdom save for Toll the Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. A wisdom save for you, that's a 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it succeeds. Sorry. For you, it's 13 as well for your DC. That is a five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You couldn't have them roll that for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Crystal Pepsi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really love Crystal Pepsi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Original run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage for the Sacred Flame, which should be-- What's the damage on the spell?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The damage on the Sacred Flame is-- The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it's 1d8. Go ahead and roll 1d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. That's okay. It was for visual anyway.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It was. That's true. I would have wanted the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch the light burst in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've pulled the ripcord on Blur if they're doing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Blur. That all happens in a quick instant as they rushed forward and you guys caught up. Now we're rolling initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get this one right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a vision of me before me and also behind me, flickering in and out of view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20. 25 to 20 anybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A real initiative roll. That's something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nobody got 20 to 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I call you Shaq?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, Nott, and Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you got ten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten to 15. Ooh, boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Siebzehn

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb's before Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's zip-- seven?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Siebzehn

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, what did you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the gnolls are all clumping together, preparing for your onslaught right at the edge of the hole with the furniture on the opposite side there, the two skeletal gnolls who are getting ready to rush into the fray. Top of the round is Shakäste.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Frostbite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Against which one?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Oh, wait, first of all, they burst into flames, this gentleman burst into flames, and when that happened, what did these gentlemen-- how did these gentlemen react?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two other gnolls glance over at the side, and then look towards the tunnel where you guys were. It didn't seem like it was much of a distraction for them, unfortunately, in the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right as we all ran in at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it wasn't a sourceless cluster as you guys all made your way to the base.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right then, I say the one closest to us, I will hit with Frostbite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Would that be that one there?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That would be that fellow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Frostbite he has to roll against your DC, so I roll it for you. That is a natural one, so go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. That is the diamond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be, is that a d8 for that one as well?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. Wait, by 1d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it would be d6. I'm pretty sure it's a d6 for the cantrip.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: 1d6? Is that this one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, a similar cold to what you saw coalesced around the armor of Fjord, this time it's attacking and freezing inward, and you watch as the gnoll (gnoll pain sounds). It's shaking briefly, you watch as its muscles are beginning to slow down and become sluggish. Do you want to move, or do you want to stay where you're put?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Actually, I feel pretty good right behind these fellows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you stay there. That ends your turn. The gnolls will now go. The three of them are going to begin to back away, and they're all going to take strikes with their bow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ranged attackers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all pull out their arrows, and each are going to make a strike. The one you frostbit is going to attack you, it has disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, let's all cluster up at the bottom of the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds great. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a three and a two, with disadvantage, so no, it misses you entirely. It actually gets partially caught in the 'fro, and makes its way to the back.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Got to be careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Missed them all, thankfully. The next attack in the front is going to be against Beau, and then one's going to be against Molly, since you guys are the most visually impressive of the front row color-wise. You blend into the surroundings a little bit comparatively, so against Molly-- Man, they cannot roll, that is a six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I slice it, catch it in the spin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one versus you, Beau, that is a 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dodge out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Devil sticks?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think that's what they-- yeah. I seem to remember them being--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. I'm going to hop up and move to the left. I'm not even going to use the real stairs, I'm going to get to the side up on that barrel over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and use Vicious Mockery on the one closest to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 15 on the saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's fine, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (devilish voice) Ack! Fuck! Can't finish it! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talk tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep using your movement if you want or you can stay put.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get to the-- No, I'm going to stay back because I'm a little-- yeah, I'm going to let other people come up first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ending your turn Molly, it's Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Excuse me, pardon me, pardon me, excuse me. I'm going to cut through the front and go as far up the stairs as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take one shot, at the one who looks frosty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's that guy there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. (crossbow sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, it does hit, and then splinters off the armor. Off the ice in particular.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans) I will, bonus action, go right back to where I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (goblin yell) You rush back down. That finishes your turn Nott, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pardon me, excuse me, excuse me, pardon me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move forward, up to the other side. Yeah, can I see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? Fuck it. Should I do this?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it. I'm going to climb up the stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (imitating Laura) Climb up the stairs. Hello, gentleman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to Invoke Duplicity!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shaka-pow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where's it going to appear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to appear next to the-- yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to be like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action. That's your go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then can I use my movement to crouch behind this table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, that's as far as you can get with your movement, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie dokie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's going to-- five, six. It does not have a ranged attack, so instead it's going to rush forward and engage with you right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Beau's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Is it dark in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is dark. You currently, there's a little bit of light that you have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The closest globule is ten feet behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're seeing action happen up ahead, and you're like (groan). You don't have a good bead. You can still do things, but you're considered blind, so you have disadvantage on any attacks that you make.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I run up to the guy that just came up to Jester and wait until that light comes up from Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can hold your action if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold the attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush up and you can see the outer glimmers of bits of bone and its body moving as it rushes in to harry Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I hold my action, can I also hold my bonus action with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Only your action, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to spend a ki point and do patient defense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go into a defensive potion there, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can still attack when it comes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My choo-choo train of globules of light go (whirring) and float over all our heads--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lighting up the vicinity here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm already falling into a routine with my other human friend here, because I know that she's a badass, but not without light. The globules pass her and curve to the left a little bit, and one floats above her head. The last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As soon as it comes around me, I'm going to use the staff with the light as it comes and crack it down over top of his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There we go. I'll hit the elbow. 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the light emerges above, you leap into the air, swing the staff, bring it straight down, as it does--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have the light following behind me as I run up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It splinters the skeleton into pieces all around its entire body, crushes and collapses to the ground. Scattered across.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Anastasia, did you just see that? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, rest of your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was it. No, I'm staying where the hell I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stay where you are, all right. That finishes your go. The light is in the room. The end of Caleb's turn, that is now Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah! I'll move up 15 feet. Sorry, I apologize,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll come up the stairs so I can get a line of sight on any of those motherfucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, 30?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, I'll be behind Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Behind Beau right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hug the wall, let Fjord do his thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you right there. We'll just lean you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Coming through!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There. Oh, excuse me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one are you shooting at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The closest one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the one that's been frosted. Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, for against him, does not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately. It manages to strike some sort of shield on the side that shatters. It's bolted to its forearm. It pulls it up just in time to deflect the Eldritch Blast. It cracks the shield and does damage to its exterior, but no wound to the actual gnoll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Fjord. Top of the round, you hear this (hyena barking and growling).

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy footfalls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's the general!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watch as an armored gnoll--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Here comes the general!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the back of the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gnoll Washington! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are outgunned.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What!

lines.name: LAURAKHARY
lines.text: Outmanned!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Outnumbered, and crossbow. As the pack lord approaches, cackling at the sight of you, you see a look of recognition on its eyes as it pulls back its longbow and is going to go ahead and fire immediately at-- Well, first I'm going to see-- It does see through the illusion, so it does not fire for the fake Jester; however, it does fire for you, the actual Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Blood Maledict.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently do not have visual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not have visual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in your current position, nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. Fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't hit you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17! I put my shield up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its go. We're now at the top of the round. It's your turn, Shakäste.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (whisper) Shakäste.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Aid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A rakshasa.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I don't know, this big guy's got me worried. This may take a little time. Nobody seems to be able to hit shit right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome to the game!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, so I say myself and my two brave warriors who are so far frontal, Mrs. and Mrs.?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's all take Aid. I will, and so will they.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is Aid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aid, is that 2nd-level?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Aid is 2nd-level, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you both get five additional hit points to your max, and five hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the three of you, your max hit points go up by five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gain five hit points on top of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Shakäste and I say: Are you a motivational speaker or something?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I pack them in on the Menagerie Coast, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He knew the location!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He totally did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He fucking studied up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There, it's already at 30, so 31?? Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you feel this sudden burst of physical hardiness surge within, this warm glow in your belly that helps stir you up to the future of physical impact and damage. That's your action; do you want to move at all on your turn?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sure. You know what? I think I'll move up a few feet, and I'll also take Anastasia and put her a little further forward, but at a safe distance from these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Like this direction, or this direction?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Actually, yeah, closer to me. Yeah, there we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll put Anastasia perching on the wall there, looking that way.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You deflect it with your sickle, which you've unhooked from earlier. Just grab it and (shing) off to the side, parrying it. The skeletal witherling rushes up and is going to attempt to strike at you with a bite actually. It's going to lash out with its horrible bony maw. That is going to be a ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Teeth shatter and break and fly off around the exterior of the shield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look over at Beau and I'm like: I'm doing you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good job!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing that, "Good job!", you look back just as two arrows go flying towards you from the two other gnolls. They both have disadvantage, I believe, right? Because you took your defensive stance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, which is good because that would've been a 20, and an 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss, miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if I can catch another arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do my Deflect Missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaction, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and do like a frisbee catch in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll your die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a d10, right, d10? What was it, six damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five plus my seven, so yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the first arrow you dodge out of the way, and the second one you see it coming out of the way. There's a brief moment where time seems to (whirring) and you catch it right in the middle of your hand. It pulls you back a little bit and looking down you can see the arrow is there, right in the middle of your grip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stuttering) We're so cool right now! Yeah!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end the gnolls' go. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to try and run up the stairs toward the undead guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a swing at him. That's 14 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only a 12 armor class.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Let's see what we do. That's (counting) 11 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your first strike, infused with the rite, you streak down with your first blow and your scimitar carves through the upper part of its shoulder blade into its ribcage. As you do, you watch as whatever necrotic energy's holding its body together suddenly dissipates and all the bones clatter to the ground in a pile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep running and to get to the other side of that other gnoll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Actually, if there's any way, can I get all the way around him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Yes, there is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! I don't know if this is helpful, but I'm going to take my second swing. That's 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get the bonus to your wisdom, but you still have the rite on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage on the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Regular gnoll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the momentum of that first strike, you continue running and with a backwards swipe carve through the back of the other gnoll. It arches its back with pain as you carve this giant wound across the back of its shoulder to about where the base of its spine is, and you see blood beginning to flow from its wound where the bits of the armor are separated, and the fur poking out from within the haphazard hide. I believe that ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. End of Molly's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I will run up behind Shakäste and I'll peek around and fire at the frosty one right in front of Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Frosty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits, and you do get sneak attack because it is currently--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Engaged!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So engaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Picard voice) Engage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait for the moment where Jester moves out of the way. As it's pulling back and beginning to try and strike again with its spear, and take the shot and watch as it hits right in the sternum and pulls back its spear and with its final thrust of momentum, falls to the ground into a pile and is now bleeding out of its mouth as it's unconscious and dying on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good fighter you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, I will cast Mage Hand and pull back the cloak around Shakäste's cloak, to see what's in his back pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you cast it as a bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning you cast it as an action. You can't do that yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will do this with my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check. I need you to go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Ah, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20. Add your perception skill modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, 20.

lines.name: LIAM, KHARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does he see hanging off the back of your belt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything off the belt, in the back pocket?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, gosh, what do I have back there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What don't you have back there?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, what don't I have back there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's assless chaps! (laughter)

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: He sees a pouch that's relatively full, I would say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just hanging right there on the back of the belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. That's my action; that's my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action. That finishes your turn, Nott. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That went really well, so I'm going to run-- Oh, god, there's three of them right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to spread pretty soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I going to do? I'm going to run into-- Oh, no, that's really dumb. I'm going to use my duplicate and she's going to Toll the Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the orange one.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Toll the Dead!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a wisdom saving throw!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Toll house.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Roll low!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a really loud gong. He takes four damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four points of damage. All right. That was to which one of these two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The orange one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The orange one, okay. Both of them have been damaged now, a little bit. You watch as it shakes its head for a second, and it's beginning to string another arrow. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, had he not been damaged yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had not been damaged before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shouldn't have rolled a 12. I should have rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then roll that eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Weirdly, more damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there you go. Now he's damaged. Good catch on that. That end your turn or do you want to move? Well you moved your-- oh, that was a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a bonus action I did that, so I'm going hop up on the table that I'm next to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll bring us to Beau's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to vault past everybody. Well, never mind they all moved. I'm going to run up right into fray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right in between the orange guy and the gray guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit, and then I'll probably do my Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to run up, I'm going to go for a rib shot with the bo. It's not a good roll. It's not great. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit. As you rush forward to swing with your first strike, the one that'd been firing at you from the previous round notices your approach, throws the longbow over the arm and brings up the shield in the same motion and deflects the quick thrust of your staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're doing Flurry of Blows you have two more attacks on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, wonder if that's a good idea. Maybe I should-- I'm going to Patient Defense this again. Do I have a bonus attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do that instead of your bonus attack. You hit once, it gets deflected, and you spend your bonus action to do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That didn't go as well as I thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. You've engaged them, which means they're less likely to use their bows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't really have a clear view of what's going on so I would, on this wall here, I would inch five or ten feet up the cave to see what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get just about there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see a gigantic gnoll and-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that you saw earlier in Alfield and that you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do what I did to him before and I'm going to bring my hand once around, twice around, three times around and cast Scorching Ray on that one only. First is a 17.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Caleb!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are the only hits he's had all campaign.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, I think Shakäste makes us better people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shakäste, stay forever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He makes us better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18. That is a total of 20 of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome. As he turns the corner, the two gnolls back out of the way and you see it standing there. It has its large two-handed glaive in its hand, its shield slung over one shoulder, the bow over the other, and seeing this for the first time, you see this larger, muscular, more dark-furred gnoll that looks like the leader of this cluster, this pack. The armor it has is chunks of chainmail and hide armor that are patched together where a number of long, thin spines, like heavy, bone-like spikes have been woven into it like a decoration to make it look extremely intimidating. Right as it grins and gets its glaive ready, it gets blasted with three beams of burning arcane energy as they hit and impact you watch as the flames curl up and it has to pat it out with its giant hand. (snarling) It took the hit like a champ, and it seems like it's hurt, but it's still doing pretty well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wipe my arm down and say: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a good round. That finishes Caleb's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick myself up out of my prone position there on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well technically you're not prone, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I was commenting on the way I was laying. Can I come up to the top of the stairs, right there? Keeping some of my movement left, and can I cast Eldritch Blast, at the gnoll that's standing in front of the big bad baby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? You may. Go ahead and roll the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. That plus six, that's eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. That one, as it's notching another arrow into its bow it takes the impact off of its shoulder. It grazed it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I cast Hexblade's Curse on the big motherfucker and say: Come on, you sack of shit, come get me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. We'll mark him with the Hexblade Curse with this big old angry black circle to mark him as the target there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement to go back down the stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come get me, you coward!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. Back of the combat round, it's now the pack lord's turn. The pack lord returns to this way--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack of opportunity-- oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make a shove attack against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a pit, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's a big ol' pit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought they were stairs!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we couldn't see that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's another poo hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had no idea that was there!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood Maledict to all fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He already has disadvantage because of Patient Defense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can imagine that, Matt. We needed the fear of god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, look at that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning) Well. I'm suddenly having regrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One and 17. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit! All right, so, hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that hit or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits. We'll see with the shove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's five feet unless it's stronger. Could be ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm seeing if there's a contested check, we haven't done the shove in a while here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that back wall perfectly blocks that whole thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry, guys. That's my bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally probably wouldn't have even have run up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine. You're just going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got a staff. You can jam it into a thing on the way down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would've been nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your eldritch knight is going to be great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, actually it doesn't have a roll of attack against you, technically, so that wouldn't have mattered. It's a contested athletics versus your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Versus my strength, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Versus your athletics or acrobatics, your choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the acrobatics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, ninja!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll check real fast to see if your Patient Defense affects that at all, not sure if it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give her your energy, guys. What the fuck are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't want my energy, it's been bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: (chanting, rhythmic breathing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you looking for patient defense shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't affect this roll, unfortunately. It's just a straight roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it doesn't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It's a contested roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (chanting) Monk monk monk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (glumly) I know what he rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can come look at The Snitch right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can make this go away at any time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your acrobatics check. It's not an automatic success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. Pick the dice that I use.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 23 total. It only has a plus three strength bonus, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is clearly a case of the husband favoring the wife.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to die. (yelling) Ugh! Goddamn it! That happened before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls back and Sparta kicks you. Right as you turn to try and defend, whack! It hits you right in the sternum and you get pushed back five feet, which puts you right on the edge. I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity check to try and catch yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saving throw? (Panicked breathing) I'm good at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say those things, Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're not good at anything. Let's stop pretending that we're good at anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because you did have patient dodge going, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had Patient Defense, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's against attack rolls, but I feel like I just saw something. For dodge action, "and you make dexterity saving throws with advantage."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a high DC, you have to beat I think with this and the impact that hit you, you have to beat an 18, so go for it. You have advantage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage and have a good bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to roll at least a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've already fallen off one cliff, you're not going to do it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please be better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the exact same thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two 11s! Two! 11s!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Beau slips, can't get a grip, and then falls and tumbles into the pit below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (fading scream)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blind justice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The pit is six feet deep.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: There's a grate on that-- can you grab it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Busting fingernails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what she was trying to grab as you fell back. That was the dexterity saving throw, because it was a grate. You suffer 11 points of bludgeoning damage, which-- it's not bad. You fell 40 feet and landed on your back onto hard rocks and stones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could have been worse, although you are our tank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (normally) 11 points?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Did the aid I give help at all with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right. Hang on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five more hit points than you had before the battle started.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it halved the fall damage. That's so mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his go. Shakäste, you're up. You watched Beau fall into this pit behind--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a turn around.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (wheezing) I'm good. I'm okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an old man down in the bottom of the pit.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Good to know. Let's see, I'm running out of spells. Let's see. I can't do this anymore because

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you can do this a million times.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I can do this a million times?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have four 1st-level spells per day you can cast and two second. You've used one 2nd-level, so have one of those, and you've cast Thunderwave before, so you still have three 1st-level spells.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I still have three 1st-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You can cast with any of those.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Would it be best-- could I Command the big guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try.

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to Command him to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or one of the smaller ones if you want a higher rate of success, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe get a little bit closer.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right, maybe, yeah get a little bit closer in order to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not all the way.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, I can see him just fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can see him, the big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet of range on that.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, how close am I to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's within range. He's about 30 feet from you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see, if I asked him to drop or asked him to fall-- could I ask him to fall on his fellows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't ask him to fall on somebody else's weapon. You can ask him to drop prone if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what are they, like "lie down" or "drop your weapons" or it's a single word, so "drop." Drop everything in his hands, or you could say "lay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turn, jump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop his weapon, no don't listen to me, do what you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could say "dance" and he would just start dancing.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The target doesn't move and takes no action. How about-- oh, you know what? Drop,

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's pretty good.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I say: Halt. I say we tell the big guy to halt. Not to mention, "halt" is good, because he's actually standing in front of his dudes as well, that'd give them-- that would make it harder for them to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you say as he finishes kicking Beau into the pit and turns (snarling).

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Halt. Is what I say. Halt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks back towards you, and I see the spell DC is 13 for you. That is a two, it does not succeed. You watch as it puts its weapons down for a second and looks right at you, eyes wide, confused as it turns its head (inquisitive sound).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that last a round?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He keeps his weapons in his hand, though?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it takes no actions for its next turn.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move or stay where you are?

lines.text: It hits? You take four points of piercing damage. Attacking against you, Jester. A natural 20, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Oh! I'm going to take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends their turn, Molly, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, that's nice! 13 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carve through the body. Its eyes still locked on-- (chuckles) Its eyes are still locked on Shakäste, not looking away, going (grunts).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot number two is 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage again for that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's seven points of damage. I'm going to try and see what happens if I disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you back away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back away towards me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That way. It sees you walk away and makes a strike towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he try and make his strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just curious. I was going to hit him if he's going to try and hit me. I'm going to hit him right back with Blood Maledict.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That'll give him disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use the full Blood Maledict so I'm going to take a little damage. Yep. Oh, I take my three points of damage. I start bleeding again from the neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second roll for that attack was a three plus five. So yeah, it misses you; it's an eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up a little further to get--

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: No one's in sneaky range. I'm going to caress the little pouch, little bit. Looking up to Caleb to see if he's looking at me at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trying to make good choices. I will leave the pouch and draw the hand crossbow and run up a few stairs and then I will crouch down on my knee and hold my attack until someone is within sneak attack range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're holding that there. Ending your turn Nott, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run forward and attack him because he's not moving at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't have a reaction, so you can back away now.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both of you guys make your attack. Or whatever you're doing, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 also hits. Both of you guys roll damage.

lines.text: 16 hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently held.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was him! He did it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was you!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you collide with the gnoll pack lord as you release a bolt that strikes it in the throat.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Dude, thank you for that. Because of that, I regain hit points equal to my warlock level plus my charisma modifier.

lines.text: Oh because your Hex thing?

lines.text: Really appreciate that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.text: Yeah, we do. Wait, what kind of weapon was that guy holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a glaive. It was a large two-handed polearm with an axe head at the end of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty big.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points I heal. That's fucking sweet.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Which means to bluff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To blathe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Jester's turn. That brings us to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like (groaning). You get up from prone, so it's half your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Can I do some cool monk shit and do like a (wall jumping) to get out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a small enough space, I'll let you make an athletics check or acrobatics check instead of athletics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it small enough to where I can do the wedge myself--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not small enough for that, unfortunately. It's about a ten foot gap, but you can leap from side to side or you can climb with athletics. It's your choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is leap from side to side also athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's acrobatics to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that one. Let's do that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's monkish. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Monkish? Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leap, leap, leap, leap. You get about 20 feet up your movement before you have to grab onto the wall to stop yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. Still enough. And if you wanted to use an action to dash, you could make it the rest of the way up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pole vaulting off, parkouring up the wall until eventually you leap and get back up to the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you guys know there's a hole?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did not know that. Did not know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I climbed out of the hole to two gnolls. Hole to gnoll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Beau's turn, Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb, who was just going into his bag to pull out a ro-- oh, she does not need the rope, okay. So instead I pull out the diamond and I start spinning it around and it turns to thunder and I sent that flying into the tannish colored-- Chromatic Orb to that one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? All right, roll for the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Thunder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. That is a 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. This is thunder damage is a total of... oh, just eight, you know. Just eight points of thunder damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. It impacts and it looks like really hurt now and it's like (heavy breathing). It's getting ready to run. It looks like it's in the process of deciding to flee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Diplomatic immunity! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caleb's turn, Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my full movement to come back up the stairs as far as I can? 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll to attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. That is (counting) 15 points of Eldritch Blast damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now looking scared and ready to bolt. That ends Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pack lord's gone. Shakäste, you're up. There is this one who's very wounded and about to flee.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes. I will run a few steps up and hit it with Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That is a natural four. It does not succeed so roll damage on that one. d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got up!

lines.text: I did! It took everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All good!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Six.

lines.text: Six points of damage. That's-- aw man, almost! As it bursts into flame, its body is now singed by the radiant energy that's burned around its torso. It's breathing heavy and limping and it's going to go ahead and-- is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Is

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your movement, your action so.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I moved and I action so bonus action? Is there some?

lines.text: If you have anything that could use a bonus action.

lines.text: You have a spell that does it, but I don't think it's going to be helpful right now.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: KHARY, LIAM
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, hold off on that. Okay, so that ends your turn. It's going to turn and bolt. It was right up against you, so you do get an attack of opportunity on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yes! Fuck you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got one hit point.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. Oh no. Is there still an ear left?

lines.text: Yeah, you can pull the ears out. There a little wet, but they're functional.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. we'll come back and begin that right after we take a quick break. So we're going to take a quick break. I'm going to sit back down here. We'll continue the story here in just a moment, but before we do that, real fast, we have a couple things. One, we have a gift here from Wyrmwood for our resident monk over there.

lines.text: What, really?

lines.text: With a letter.

lines.text: Oh wait, this is to all-- wait. Oh. It was probably addressed to me because of Geek & Sundry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It is a gift for me.

lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Wyrmwood. Thanks for Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, they give us plenty. Anyway, two of you will win this. When you're prompted in the chat and only in Twitch chat, to use the keyword 'hush'. H-U-ace-H-S. H-U-S-H. There we go, I can spell. Brain not working, too much math. Hush in the chat, when you're prompted. Only enter once or you'll be disqualified, but we'll come back with two winners after the break. We'll see you guys here in a few minutes.
