lines.text: I've gotta pee!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and welcome back everybody. So, before we jump in here, we have our two winners in the chat of the Wyrmwood giveaway. They are Grugswald.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grugswald and onegirlx10. Congratulations to you guys, Grugswold and onegirlx10, Danoba will contact you and get your information and get those sent to you in the chat. Congratulations and we'll have more of these in future episodes. They're awesome. They're pretty rad.

lines.text: Look at how jealous Laura is. Look at that. It fuels me. I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would be careful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm here more than you these days. You better hide that thing.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bringing it back in, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all real good friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Congratulations, Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So happy for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, finishing this fray, you gather the gnoll ears as well as--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rummage through their bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did. I know. I'm doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. That's not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Did you see that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cocked. Well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is not cocked. I rolled a one and a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah. A three for investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, there's the glaive. It's hard to miss that. It's pretty well-made; it's sturdy, it has some of the spines that are part of the armor as well affixed to it along the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take it. How heavy is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Copper aren't as shiny to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who wants this gold? Anybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never say no to gold.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I could use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here is three gold for you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You are the best thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here is three gold for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much was in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's seven gold left. Here's three gold for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where does Shakäste?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Shakäste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where does Shakäste put the gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where does Shakäste put the gold?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I put it in my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do it discreetly if you want to.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, I suppose a blind man does put his gold in his back pocket pretty discreetly, actually. He doesn't have to look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check. Or a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three gold for you. I've got one gold left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take it.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus what's your sleight of hand skill?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sleight of hand is plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 14. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have no idea. He receives the gold and the hand disappears beneath the cloak which is now covering most of his torso and you have no idea where it got put.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much silver did you say there was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two silver.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Do I notice her looking at me? I mean, does Anastasia notice her looking at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, no more than anybody looks at anybody.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, has been leering at you since you arrived but nothing in a way that catches your attention.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Nice to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. Roll a d20 and add your insight skill.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Insight. Nine. Nine plus insight is plus three so, eh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 12. I'd say, yeah. No more than usual.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right. She's got awfully big eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys get closer to the exit where this broken, hinged archway was, this double door archway about eight to ten feet wide, a new smell rushes into your nose. Whereas previously it had been just decaying earth and dust there's now this musky smell that resembles the faint mixture of urine and citrus. It's hard to place, but it's new and it's different than the rest of the mines you've been through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a step up for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got all the ears?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got all the ears. Should we search for more survivors and then burn it to the ground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the mine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burn the mine to the ground? Under the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can explode it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I appreciate your excitability. Why don't I let the bird do the talking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You mean search for people?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's what I meant, baby. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (humming) You watch at the Duchess makes her way further down the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As the Duchess flies away, I push on Shakäste's body a little bit and see if I get any reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There does not seem to be a reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pick the pocket of Shakäste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're focused currently to the vision of your-- you do not sense--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I do not sense a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not because currently all of your senses are through your familiar. So unfortunately no.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's fine by me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do any of us notice this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use sleight of hand to conceal this from the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will have to, so make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, okay, that's not great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our guests are like farm animals that we mine for loot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Nobody has a passive perception higher than a 13, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Mine's 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horrible bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and mark nine gold pieces off of your total and you take nine gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going for that pouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole pouch?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You're going for the whole-- Wait, I wouldn't feel the entire pouch being pulled off of my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, unfortunately, because your senses. Well wait, no, it's sight and hearing, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's sight and hearing for Find Familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! I take it back. He didn't react to you being touched earlier, but I need you to go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah, it's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus what is your perception skill?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Plus insight or--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There it is, 16.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Perception? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the initial pat, you were focused, it didn't bother much. You feel your belt tug a bit and you feel suddenly the back of your armor begin to get a little lighter as your pouch is noticeably being removed from your person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't know by whom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just knows that it's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can't react?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, he can if he chooses too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste, do you want to do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a height that's very identifiable. It's a very recognizable level you're on.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, I don't want to do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You undo the pouch and now have it in your possession. As you're focusing through the Duchess's vision, beyond the broken doorway the tunnel grows rougher as you sense that the deeper shafts of the mines are coming to an end fairly soon. The scent the Duchess is picking up is strong, that weird musky smell. After about 100 feet of it snaking a little bit forward, through ten, 15 foot wide tunnels, suddenly the tunnel opens, into a large, rocky alcove formation, stalactites from the ceiling, and some elements of broken digging equipment around the corners of this chamber. The uneven ceilings stand about 15 to 20 feet tall within in places, and are scarred with pick marks from various attempts to meet the end of the mine, which apparently were not enough to keep the mine in business. A rough slope descends from the immediate entrance to this tunnel, hits the wall before it, rises a few feet past that to a smaller platform that meets the opposite side of the wall, about 70 or 80 feet to the other side. The chamber's about 80-foot from where you enter to the opposite end. Near the base of the raised rock you see two humanoid figures, sitting against each other, bound tightly in ropes and above the platform on top, you see a figure you haven't seen yet. Human-like, but seems to have large chunks of gnoll flesh strapped to their body, like they used a disembodied gnoll arm as a glove, a gnoll head with the jaw removed and hollowed out used as a hood. There is this individual carrying baubles and chains of some symbols across their neck and they're spattered with blood. They're standing at the top, currently holding a third humanoid figure who is bound in ropes, and dragging them up the stairs to this platform on the opposite end. Next to this gnoll-wearing priestly-like figure, you see the figure in their arm is a guard, one of the Crownsguard of Alfield. You don't recognize him at a glance, but you can see they are currently still living, bloodied and are being dragged up to the top of this platform. You can see right at the top of this raised section a monstrous mound of broken wood, rope, burlap and scrap from nearby within the mine that has been amassed into this large pile. At that moment a majority of the mound begins to move and shift, as two large, brown red, leathery wings unfurl from the mound. Where a fur-covered body steps out. Is the Duchess going to stay and continue to watch?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I can explain what is happening as she sees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You are describing this verbally to everybody?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes, absolutely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? What should we do?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We should wait and see what else unfurls in this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This creature stands up from within this pile, you can now see this large, lion-like body and torso the size of a rhinoceros, massive and muscled, with giant clawed paws. Around the neck you see this thick, red, fiery mane of hair and a humanoid female face, dark and tanned, with this large, curled grin. The mouth that opens and hangs with rows of sharp teeth, but weirdly humanoid in appearance. It turns its head towards this priestly figure, who thrusts the guard to the front and says "Come, gifted mother. Feed and may you grow strong. Your strength is a boon from Yeenoghu, and one that will bring us much more meat in the time to come," and kicks the guard forward. This large beast turns, and inspects the frightened, shaking, and sobbing guard. "Your god meats hold me to nothing, but your offer pleases me and my child." As the beast stands up further in this pile of rough, found pieces of wood and twine, a small infant of its same species seems to be wound up and begins to mewl in its place. It's pawing at the air, its eyes not even freshly opened. This creature steps forward and bites into the Crownsguard and lifts it up as he begins to scream. The rest of you hear the echoing screaming in the distance of the Crownsguard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that means he ate him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it begins to bite and crunch, pulling its jaw open, it tears it into two halves and begins to chew on the upper torso. The screaming has stopped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get your medical kit ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't think it's going to help.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: There are two people left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two people left in the room and you can look around the vicinity. It looks like there were more people in here that have probably been fed over the past hour.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: This sacrifice will not end. First, Duchess come back to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go in?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We should talk. This is going to take a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, nobody seems to notice Duchess's presence as Duchess retracts back into your chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How flammable is that nest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I meant it's--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: How far is the nest away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's past 100 feet of tunnel before it opens up into the chamber, which is another 80 feet from the entrance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big was the chamber?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 80 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give you a visual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A visual? Matt, there's too many maps!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Singing) Too many maps! Too many maps!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh look at this thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can prepare.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is upper level shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we doing? We're level three! What are we doing? We got to go in, we got to throw some dynamite, get the people out, and run!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We got one stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got two sticks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see any support columns. I'm just going to say it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we hit the nest. Set the nest on fire and it'll run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You got to get pretty danger close to do that, though. I've got to stand up and look, make sure there's no damn holes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, good point. Yep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No holes in the chamber from what you can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the baby, the little thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, no load bearing support columns that we can see right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that you can see, no. There are various portions in the ceiling that are stalactites. It looks like it's the deepest part of the mine, which is the roughest, which means it does not have a lot of support structure built into it for the miners. This like it's as deep as they got before they abandoned it from the veins dried up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before shit started going wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This mine has been long abandoned. The recent occupants seem to have discovered it, and taken it their own.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, personally I'm a fan of freedom of religion, but that's got its limits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fair to draw a line at human sacrifice.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Let's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't possibly kill whatever that beast is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, maybe not on our own, two at a time. I'm pretty tapped, but there's a lot of us here and only a few of them there, according to our new friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's only two survivors in there, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two survivors and two enemies, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but what happens if they get sacrificed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean, what if we just get the survivors out and leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's smart.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I tend to agree with my little friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we steal the baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could also try and seal the cave behind us as we go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sealing the cave would be one thing, I think stealing the baby is going to be a bit of a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love your enthusiasm, but I tend to agree with Molly here. Maybe the baby just stays put?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can get the baby, I bet it would fetch a high price.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A baby should be with its mother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We might kill the mom though, or bury it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I'm okay with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As long as they are close to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just ate a Crownsguard in half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get it out, and then collapse the tunnel leading to it. Then they can get stuck in this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could we do a quick inventory check of how much of these boom sticks that we have, the TNT?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have one and one.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have more than one? You have one?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have one amongst. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should make our way towards this, though. They're going to get to the next hostage by the time we get to this room, cause we're 100 feet away from it still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We make our way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Start walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stealthy walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all making an approach?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll stealth, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who needs a blessing? Caleb, you need a blessing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're shitty at stealth right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty shitty at stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bless you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty iffy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Plus five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Jester, for saving my ass because the first roll was a four. The second one was a 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there steps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they're real close to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so, marching order please.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: I'm in the back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what's our plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to make a bunch of noise, we're going to throw some dynamite, we're going to get the kids to run and we're going to keep them distracted by threatening the baby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it is a plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, to kill or to capture the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get the guards out, we get the people out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get the guards out and run? So who are we leaving back with the sticks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're all going to be in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the marching order?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will throw the sticks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go up front with Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! We should use the sticks to blow up narrow passage way so they can't get out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have two sticks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should use them both!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we run, then we'll drop the sticks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you in front of Caleb. Molly, are you next to Beau?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, anywhere that-- I don't want to be in the front front, but I'll be in the middle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are our two strongest? Jester?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester and Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm dexy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you've got dex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm not strong. But I'm dextrous. It depends on what we're talking about. Are we doing anything with strength checks? Oh! Dragging people away? Is that what we're talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the good guys unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're conscious, they're just tied up to each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Shit, so two people need to be on drag duty.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We could cut them free?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to have to keep them busy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need to sneak in and you need to try to unhook the ropes, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could try to untie them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You stealth around. They won't even know that you're there while we're attacking. Untie the guards and then we all run.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Could we distract them with maybe a Thaumaturgy or Spiritual Weapon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spiritual Weapon is really good if you have that, that's very badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try, it's up to you guys.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think Spiritual Weapon could make a lot of noise and call a lot of attention, and then maybe you could sneak through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could do two Spiritual Weapons if you're feeling it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but then I have no spells left. I got a first level, y'all!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think, because I used Aid, I think I've got--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one 2nd-level spell and you have three 1st-level, I believe.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes. No, I've got two 1st-levels, because I used Thunderwave and Command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct. You have two 1st-levels, you have three spells left.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: If we start with Spiritual Weapon, we lure their gaze to this side of the area and then if this beautiful young lady could find her way around the other side to free the two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can sneak in down to those stalagmites.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She should sneak in before you do Spiritual Weapon, otherwise it's going to make them aware that something's going on. The Spiritual Weapon will definitely alert them to our presence.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The Spiritual Weapon goes off, giving the people a chance to run out of the place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You make that Spiritual Weapon appear right next to them. You can hit them immediately.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do it right when we do the surprise attack. You sneak in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rest of us can be on distraction duty, yeah? Until we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you good to sneak? I'm going to bless you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before you go sneaking around the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I have a ball bearing, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. You can have a few. I hand him a handful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you just want that because it's shiny?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Mage Hand and hold one ball bearing. I'm getting ready to move stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I can have all of you who are approaching to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, DM--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In addition to the one we just made?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, the one you just made. Sorry, so what was were those scores?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage, when you go into the room, just in case of a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will also say, and I'll do this a lot, Dancing Lights is in effect behind us. 20 feet behind us, waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Interesting point of order, this human that you see, this priest. Pitch black, sees fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sees-- (groans) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does have a set of, as they've walked into this chamber-- although you would have seen this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not see that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yeah. You're the only one who would notice something. You don't see anything, never mind. All right, so--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Say that again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know nothing! So stealth is 23.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you know that you can't see?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'm blind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, what's your stealth roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. It was really good. It was a 16 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. What did you roll for stealth check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you see things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bird.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The bird, baby, the bird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste, what's your stealth check please?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: My stealth check. Oh, my stealth check was 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm the only problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, which is good because that means the rest of the group picked up for you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's right, it's 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means you can see to about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We suck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can see the stalagmites?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I believe Anastasia could fly in and hide behind the stalagmite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Make a stealth check for your hummingbird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on birdy. Ooh! Good.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right, 15 plus-- No, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 15.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's 15 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody sees your bird's arrival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Nott, go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (scampering feet)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right Nott, so you rush in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to-- Mage Hand's already cast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and what's the range on that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet, so you can keep it out as far as that. Yeah, it's fine. All right, so you come in there. Where are you holding the ball bearing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drop the ball bearing right at the edge of that stair so it (tings).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As that happens, you watch as both the priest and the large beast at this time-- which now that we're getting closer and we're seeing the form, I probably should've asked this of you earlier: go ahead and make a general nature check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's alphabetical right on the list. Ooh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Nature? Plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice it, but you, after getting a closer view of its form as your hummingbird gets in close, you can, "I know what this is." This is a manticore. The wings are scary, the teeth are scary, the spines on its tail are scarier.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It has spines in its tail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard rumors of such things being flung as a weapon and regrown quickly and begin to suddenly remember the spines that were affixed to the armor of the gnoll leader and the glaive. You rush in and have this moment of remembrance as you begin to curl forward, stealthing around the side as the ball bearing (ting ting ting). Both the priest and the manticore whip over in that direction. The priest pulls a glove on its hand that's a dull red color that begins to sparkle and glow at the tips of the fingers, and tightens it on its hand and begins to step down the stairs a bit in the direction of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going behind those stalagmites over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the way around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Whereas the female manticore, (flapping). The wind picks up and dust begins to spiral and briefly obfuscates the area. The manticore flies; with an impact, lands on the opposite side, right where the ball bearing is and (sniffs). "Company." All right, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going straight for the Mage Hand to untie them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check from a distance. Well, this would be a straight dexterity check. Roll dexterity, not sleight of hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. With a quick, rapid movement of your Mage Hand, you watch as the ropes on one come free. One of them (breathing heavily) looks at their hands and doesn't know exactly what happened but is apparently now free of the ropes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in a weird in-between combat and non-combat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. We're not in combat yet, so what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to hug the wall and slide along it. I would like to think I can hear my friends breathing-- and stop, yeah that's good-- and hold my action, and if anything comes this way that is not my friends to cast Burning Hands as a tripwire. I'm the tripwire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within range you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, anybody else? What are you preparing for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Waiting to beat face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all staying right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we creep forward a little? What should we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to have to fan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess Fjord and I will take a good ten feet or so up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're going closer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're getting really close to the manticore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe the other side of the tunnel so they don't see you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's got a distance weapon anyway, there's really no such thing as a bad--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can see me doing this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you put Fjord towards me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, pull him to the other side. They're seeing me do arcane bullshit on the side while sweating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else preparing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stand next to Caleb on the inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really, at this point, only useful for a couple things. I'm going to keep in the back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Shakäste, anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got my Vicious Mockery rolling.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I would like for Anastasia to fly to the other side of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabout?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No those stalagmites over-- yeah, there you go. Hide in those crags over there by the-- that's it. Keep a good eye. Good girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (humming drone) All righty. The manticore begins to clomp up the steps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Airborne?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, on foot at the moment like (impact sounds).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll just wait for Nott. Go Nott go.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: When do I go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, right now as the manticore crests the top of the stairs, the large, joker-like, toothy grin of the female manticore glances up right towards all of you and goes (growls).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I attack her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not within range of you yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not within range? Then I don't do it yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to roll initiative now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. My initiative is such dick. All night long. All campaign long, let's be honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did okay.

lines.name: LIAM
