lines.text: As you plunge your short sword down into the mewling, eye-covered cub, it goes still, as the mother manticore flying up in the air turns around to watch this, and gives a (roar)!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming) Get the fuck out of here!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take it back! Plan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, that ends your turn? It's the manticore's turn. The manticore, which was about to unleash a triple round of attacks against a paralyzed Fjord, who, while paralyzed, would have all been criticals, strangely saved him and is instead going to dart--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the Spiritual Weapon get a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not, no. At a 50-foot fly speed, land right next to you, Nott, and take a full round of strikes against you. Too angry to worry about tail spines at this point, it's going all in, physical assault to whatever just murdered its baby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on the first strike. 17 and a natural one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, I'll say, causes it to strike down towards you in fury, and instead its claw gets jammed into the ground, so it gets disadvantage on its second attack. I'm trying to play with natural ones a little more in this campaign. This is the second claw attack against you. A natural 20 and a 17. It hits but it avoids the critical, which is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine points of slashing damage with the claw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then the bite attack is going to come towards you. I'm going to give this advantage because you just killed its baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you killed its baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's going to be a 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. There we go, there's the actual damage die roll. That's 11 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) One point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit! (laughter and gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the manticore's turn. The civilians get up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, leave, motherfuckers! Leave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And begin to run. (counting) They get that far with the movement and dash. They're (gasping) tripping and falling, managing to make their way there. They're both frightened, covered in all sorts of dirt and gore, and running in your direction, trying to get away from whatever's happening back there. The roar set a further fire in them. All right. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (moans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got to grab Fjord!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab Fjord and get out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord? Nott! Nott's in danger!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm going to cast-- I'm going to cure you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How far away is Nott from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott is 40 feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or hit the fucking manticore. You got to unfreeze me, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to yell at Nott, I'm going to be like: Nott, the fuck?! Then I'm going to take off in a full sprint towards Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You can get right up to the top of the steps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go: the fuck?! I grab you again, and I scoop up Nott, and like a football drill, I dart, and then I'm going to dart all the way back with Nott. Carrying Nott like a football.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to get the hit. With me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You scoop up Nott. That means, because you're carrying another creature, your movement is halved when you run. Are you using-- it's your action to grab and pick him up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The manticore is going to take an attack of opportunity against Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, damn it! I was hoping it would be on me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course! The creature doesn't give a shit about anybody but that little goblin that stabbed its baby.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You are like holding her and covering her, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 19 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bite strike again, that is ten points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (scream)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull Nott away, there's a sudden tug, and you pull hard and you look back and you watch as you drag Nott out of the teeth of it, grinding across the body, dragging wounds like daggers across Nott's face and chest. You see blood pour out of each of these scars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck?! I still run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you are unconscious and bleeding out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have a bonus or anything, right? That was everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, that's your whole turn. You used everything for that. End of Beau's turn. Caleb and the priest are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw that, and I walk as far forward as I can with my movement and start stirring the pot on Chromatic Orb. I have one left. I will use ice damage and I will send it out and I knock it off my hand towards the manticore. Come on, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sticks! The dynamite sticks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 3d8 cold damage. That is-- ooh! 15 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of cold damage. Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have gone as far forward as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You moved up there. It strikes the manticore, a burst of ice that freezes part of the side of the mane and the fur on its body before the fur cracks and the flesh that it impacted cracks. There's a little bit of muscle exposed beneath the wound left behind from the frost freeze you left on the side of its torso.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is breathing very heavily and not looking at the manticore. He's looking at Nott in Beauregard's arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. The priest, who is currently working on that, going to maintain Hold Person, is going to step up. No, it's going to-- yeah, because you're right there in front, it's going to Inflict Wounds on you.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A melee spell attack. Not great. Actually, not bad! That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is your armor class. 17 hits. You take 3d10 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Necrotic! Necrotic just follows Laura Bailey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will be like a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14 points of necrotic damage to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the exact amount.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exact amount.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck fuck fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cleric's down. One of our clerics is down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the priest reaches out and grabs onto the armor of Jester, and with a burst of black energy, the veins under Jester's blue skin begin to pulse with black energy, and she screams out as her eyes loll back and close, and she hits the ground unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's next to me, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Technically, there are

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm next to two unconscious people going (screaming).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That ends the priest's turn. Your turn, Shakäste.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have one of the healing potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's your call. I will help you with decisions you make. You can get to the front of those stairs.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, let's see, I should move forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 30 feet to move forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you could put a beat down on the priest, do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That will release the Hold Person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a healing potion in my possessions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any spells slots left?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got the Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Spiritual Weapon can only move 20 feet, though, which will only get it about there, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Spiritual Weapon can move 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought it was 20 on a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, maybe I'm wrong.

lines.name: LIAM, KHARY
lines.text: The range is 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the range of the spell is 60 feet, but then the bonus action to move it is 20 feet and repeat the attack. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move forward if you want to. Did you want to move forward the rest of your--?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, if I move is anything going to get close enough? I could do Sacred Flame.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all you can do is try to take down the enemies, and we can help. That's all you can do.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All I can do is move forward and Sacred Flame the priest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's a wisdom save, right?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, that's a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be an 11. Which, your DC is 13, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right, going to roll damage. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, hit the fucking priest!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Three plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's just three points of damage. Three points of radiant damage. It bursts and he's still trying to concentrate on the spell. He does make a constitution saving throw. That's an eight. That's a failure. The DC is ten. With that, your paralysis ends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's either half the damage or ten, whichever is higher. With that, you blast it, and he loses the spell, and all of a sudden your body comes back into control of you, Fjord. You have the bonus action. You can still move the weapon if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd get it into the business.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was up ten feet, technically. It can move down and then move over here, and it would be down on the ground right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on its way for the next round.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sure. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted. You could move it anywhere else you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who do I pour that potion into, you or you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Stay right there, Estelle. She doesn't move quickly, but she moves effectively.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bust (humming) and rests floating in the air. That brings us to the top; Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, there is so little I can do. I'm going to move forward a bit, I'm going to move close enough that I can-- I'm just going to keep trying to-- Put me next to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shite. I'm just going to keep trying to give disadvantage to the first attack on the manticore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Vicious Mockery?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that here. Wisdom save for the manticore. 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck. Fuck fuck fuck. Not even In infernal. Fuck fuck fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it, an action or a bonus action to pour a health potion into somebody's mouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run down and pour a health potion into Jester's mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, because that gets me up and I can heal you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, in time for your turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a regular healing potion, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a regular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so that would be 2d4 plus two you heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You roll? You roll? Who rolls?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six plus two. Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you heal eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement to start running up the stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how much I have left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there it was (counting) six, that's as far as you get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, fair enough. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move out of range, the priest is going to make a strike at you with his dagger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was I in melee of the priest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, to get to her you would have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay in there, then. I couldn't see where I was. Yeah, I'll stay close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you would have moved-- Oh, god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, everyone's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all going to shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You stay there. That end's Fjord's turn, Jester, you're up. You are on the ground, prone, but are now conscious and breathing, as you feel the glass vial pulled away from your lips, and Fjord looks down at you with a nod, like "Go!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you! I stand up. I'll reach out and cast Cure Wounds on Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll that. That's a d8 plus your wisdom modifier?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it is. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just say to Beau: The fuck?! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight points to heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you heal eight points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I guess we should start running, yes? I use the remainder of my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Movement to run? You can move 15 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clerics do not get that. Sorry. Let's put you there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My bonus action to whimper a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The priest does get attack of opportunity on you as you run past, as you were engaged in melee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm hoping the priest is lame.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a weakling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Jester. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this is crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're prone, technically, in Beau's arms right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I will look up at the manticore, I'll take out my last shitty tart that you gave me, and crumple it onto the ground, and point up to the manticore and say: What did the incontinent druid say on his surprise birthday party? I'm so excited, I wet my plants! (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind, leave him behind.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: How much damage did that give?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, to all of us? TPK up in this business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is, I assume Hideous Laughter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Hideous Laughter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll see if this works. Wisdom saving throw. That is a 12. What is your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's been a lot of just under this game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The dad joke works!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Weirdly, as angry as this manticore is at you-- You know what? I'm going to give it advantage in the saving throw because you killed its baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's just mean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You killed its baby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hindsight advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't help, I rolled a two. Shit. I felt it was fair for the mother of the baby that you just murdered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would have given it to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would have, and from a narrative standpoint it made sense. Still takes effect. The manticore, turning around, eyes filled with fury and anger, goes (growling). She all of a sudden begins to chuckle. As the mouth opens from the laughter, you see the jagged teeth, filled with your own blood, and the tongue lashing around from the laughter as it falls on the ground, prone and cackling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is goblin blood red or green? Red?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dark enough where, in this lighting, it looks black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hideous Laughter. Does that mean we all get advantage on hits now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is prone, which means melee attacks do get advantage against it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you guys! We've got a whole other round!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of what?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Attacks to wail on her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or to

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The priest has taken a little damage, but the priest also doesn't look very hardy. But it's up to you. You can flee or you can finish it. There are advantages and disadvantages. There are advantages to both.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: There are advantages to both!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Are there ears on all of that crap that this priest has on him? Are there any ears on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No ears. There is actually on the head. The gnoll head has ears.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: They have ears on that thing. And if we drag that fucking carcass back to the surface, I bet that'll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be worth a pretty penny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably not wrong.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You know what? Forget that. I want that fucking thing on my wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Well, that's up to you guys to make your choices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does Hideous Laughter last?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For at least a whole round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each time it takes damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we could unload and then run!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And each time he takes damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets to make a save again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the end of his turn, he gets to make a save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you hit him, he gets to make a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And on the end of its turn it gets to save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not like a tee off and then we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was like a paralyzation sort of thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he might save right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should stick to the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, regardless--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the dynamite?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's what I'm saying! I want to stick one in its mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You might not get that chance! It's the manticore's turn, and she might save right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. Because it is the manticore-- you still have movement, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want me to put you down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 15 feet of movement if you want Beau to put you down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I will jump down and run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you also take your bonus action to run too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, if I still have a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action dash. Well, you know what? I'm going to stay within 30 feet of the priest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All righty. Finishing Nott's turn, the manticore's turn. The manticore's chuckling, laughing on the ground, howling. It's echoing throughout the chamber in this very dark--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 35 feet of the priest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you about, roughly, we'll say there. The manticore's going to attempt to make its wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Fail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12, again! I rolled two elevens in a row!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Laugh it up, Fuzzball!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The civilians continue to run and they are just up the tunnel. You hear their heavy breathing fade as they disappear into the darkness. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do? Are we running or are we fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever you want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, it's your choice. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to, because I can, fuck the priest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move in to the priest. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad. 16!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits! He's only wearing leather armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's off-kilter to the side and he spits blood and looks back at you, "Do not worry. He will come for you too."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh! Okay, in response to that, I'm going to be like: Don't patronize me! Then I'm going to fucking Flurry of Blows. Elbow strike him to an uppercut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack. Yeah, that hits, with a 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 12. And then, not so good. 12 again. Total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately. But the next one does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six plus four. Another ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage, nice. With the staff hit, he laughs at you, the blood spilling out on the side of his chin. You smack him with the elbow, miss with the upper cut, but as the elbow cracks and hits you feel like the jaw kind of dislodge a bit. As he looks back, he reaches up and he's trying to put it back into place. He's looking not too great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I messed up that. Three plus four. I messed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said ten? Yeah, you shouldn't have done-- actually, it would've been seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven damage. I'm sorry. I was adding the wrong modifier. I was looking at the wrong guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. No worries, so seven damage on that one? That ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! No! I can still move? Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to now move past Fjord and start heading away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It already got an attack of opportunity against--. So you move up (counting) 40.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay-- that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caleb and the priest. Your turn simultaneously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a little bit there. Now I can see that blond hair, and I am tapped out, so I'm just going to let my hand blacken and say a few arcane words and then send a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does have three-quarters cover behind that from your current position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well then I will, if I can't see too well, keep going down the steps until I can see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move there to get a view without hitting--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. That's not fine, but that's fine. Fire Bolt and here it comes to you, shithead. That is a 25 to hit.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: It hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to extend my hand forward. I have five fingers out and then I pull in four. I send the flame down my hand because these people have hurt my little friend. I want his hair to burn off his head and die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you watch, Ghost Rider-style, his head just bursts into flame and burn away, until he falls back to his knees. You can just see the darkened expression of a black skull into the fire as he falls. I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! What's this mean?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A wave of memories come flooding to you, and you feel your motions grow slow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to do this on my own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste, your turn.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes. Well, I do believe I still have a Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The Spiritual Weapon goes wandering over, just as sassy as she wants to be. I do believe that the underbelly of the manticore is still waiting there for Estelle to tell him all kinds of horrible things about what it's like to live in South Florida.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's particularly awful.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: This is what your problem is. Maybe next time, you'll eat something less human-like, baby. What do I need to roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 plus five, with advantage because it is prone. So roll a d20 twice and take the higher of the two.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Roll the 20 twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Nine. Three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine plus five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine plus five is 14. That is just its armor class. That hits. It has an armor class of 14. So roll damage on that. d8 plus three.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: d8 plus three. That's this one. All right, four. Four plus three is seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage! As the bust slams into the manticore after your musings pierced its soul, it's going to attempt to make a saving throw, with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With advantage? Why with advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a two. Because whenever it takes an impact from an attack, it gets an advantage on the saving throw to break it. A two and a five, however! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, it happens. It's good, it's cinematic. It's fun. That's your bonus action. You still have an action.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I still have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well then. Let's see. Where am I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you use all your slots?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got healing in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that a bonus action to use the weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you still have an action if you want to cast another spell or do something else as an action.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. How is everybody feeling right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not too good.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Not too good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The priest is already dead. The manticore's pretty hurt. Some of them are pretty beat up and low. Some of them seem to have avoided the fray.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. Am I close enough to the point where I-- I'm still pretty far from the manticore, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 60 feet from it.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'm about 60 feet, but I would need to be at about a 15-foot cube to do my Thunderwave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you got enough distance.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, I think the cantrip will-- let's hit him again with Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame? All right. That will be an eight plus one for the wisdom modifier. That does not succeed! So roll, that's d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that worked?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. 1d8 radiant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so you roll!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, so I do roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did damage, yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I did damage. Oh,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly! That's how spells work a lot of the time, man.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Big money. Come on, baby. That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ridiculous, by the way! That's fucked up! I'm counting and I'm like, if he gets the kill this is going to-- this is ridiculous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's hospitality.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's hospitality. Jesus Christ!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put. That. Shit. On. Your. Wall. Describe it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how do you want to do this? As it's on the ground, laughing and cackling and writhing.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I drop the reed that's in my hand, and I start to play with the flames that start to light on the edges of my fingers. As I slowly bring them together, there's a musical interlude that starts to play and shoots towards the manticore. Diving down her throat, and bursting through the chest of her, and exploding her heart. You know what? I did that out of love. For someone who just lost their child.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (silence)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, time to light the TNT, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to douse the flames. I'm going to run down to the priest and douse the flames, and then give Caleb a good slap on the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Caleb comes to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slapping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! Back in the game! Time for that later. You all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Big kiss on the forehead and then walking away.

lines.name: MARISHA, KHARY
lines.text: I'm--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just going to say, I'm going to do a quick scan. See if there's anything of interest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy. Natural 19. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amongst the chunks of flesh and rather horrible attire, there's a couple of interesting adornments on the priest. The nest looks like it's a mishmash of all kinds of things cobbled together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll definitely take the adornments from the priest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. From that, there was a set of goggles that were affixed over the priest's eyes, of a dark lens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see? If I can see in the dark. I need night vision goggles!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is also that reddish glove that was affixed to his right hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't touch it! I wonder if that makes spells better. (gasps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run up onto the nest and start looking for stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You all right there? You all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never better!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Find all the shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No shit! What's the total there for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you tear through the rubble of this nest, you find a few interesting things: a skeletal hand that has been mostly chewed through, though a single fleshy finger still holds a ring of beautiful silver make and a blue gem that catches your attention. What at first looks like part of the wooden riff-raff that makes the nest, you pull out a refined and well-carved stick that doesn't match the rest of the rather rough wood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know I'm so excited, our first loot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so exciting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, tangled within the mass, you find chains but larger than normal chains. These chains are attached to a set of unlocked manacles, much larger than any human manacles you've seen. There are four identical loops, a little over one foot in diameter, all attached via this chain to one larger one about four feet in diameter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it for the manticore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the runes recognizable in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana-- are you proficient in arcana?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you proficient in arcana?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a pretty high bonus, I don't think I'm proficient in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to sit on my ass and look at the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am proficient in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unable to really ascertain the nature of the runes, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk up and pet the manticore's mantle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, fuck that thing.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'd like to cast a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to cast?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Fog Cloud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as the central portion of the chamber begins to fill with a thick mist, somewhat obscuring your vision more than a few feet in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this supposed to happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get out of here.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I step behind Nott and whisper in her ear, I say that: This was a bold move you made and we wouldn't have made it, we wouldn't have succeeded without you, so I say you earned that gold. But make no mistake, be careful where you put your fingers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, fog monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What else would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we get out of here, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything else in the chamber? Does it look like there's any other little, interesting things in there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honestly, it looks like everything was clustered in the nest or on the priest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to help me butcher that manticore head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easily enough. Within but a few moments, between the triple-blades that the two of you wield, you manage to carve a fresh and carryable by two of you-- this is now the second beast head you guys have acquired, carrying along with you-- a female manticore head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to take those giant manacles are we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'll take the tail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah we'll be taking all of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's huge, can we carry that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the manacles together probably weigh about 25 pounds, so it's carryable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just over the shoulder, just walk out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You couldn't carry it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't carry it, that's how much I weigh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even I couldn't carry that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's time for that later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on. Let's go get some sunlight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Caleb, wrap an arm around him, and try to walk him out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I'm still here with this big, giant manticore head so-- you guys got Caleb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm helping out.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys manage to exit the mines, it seems that the remainder of the gnoll warband have either scattered or collapsed beneath the earlier tunnel falling.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Gnoll cowards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cowardly gnolls, cowardly gnolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just cured me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring yourself back to the surface. The light of the day is growing closer to sunset, another hour, hour and a half or so before the sun sets, but you return to the shack, which has been untouched, unsullied since your leaving. The remainder of the survivors greet you upon you letting them know you've returned, and you watch two more reunions occur as the two individuals you had saved from the belly of the manticore find the rest of their family within the survivors. You gather the rest of the bodies, and whoever needs the travel, and begin to load up the cart you brought with you, as well as the manticore head, unless you want to carry that back to town yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it might be easier to put it on the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can rope it onto the cart without much of an issue, though you still have a single horse pulling a lot of people and a lot of manticore head. That horse is not going to be traveling at maximum speed, it's going to be a slow pace on that thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if it's all slow then it doesn't matter I can walk alongside it and pull the manticore head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only a few miles off and you'll probably get there maybe an hour or two after sunset.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably just get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make it all the way back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys make your way under the outskirts of town, back through the forest that cradles the northeast side of the city, a handful of crownsguard that are keeping watch for any sort of incursion watch you approach and immediately one of them puts up a hand, "Halt. Who "goes there?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All hail, the conquering heroes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The saviors of Alfield have returned!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right the, um, yes-- come this way," he seems to not be able to deal with the fact that you've arrived with all of these survivors, and the head of a manticore being pulled by this poor horse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's two horses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are two horses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: W.C and Crapper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Making your way into the town. Since you've seen it last, a number of buildings still lay in cinders, ash, and burned structures, but the people are in the process of cleaning and rebuilding their lives from the night before where this first attack initially happened. Within a short time, the crownsguard seemed to have brought Bryce back for you. Bryce, which you have not met yet, is currently the Watchmaster of the town. You see a genderfluid half-elf with blonde shoulder-length hair and armor. They seem to be recovering from the wound they sustained the night before and as you approach they immediately come up to you with a bit of a jog and say, "My gods, "you've certainly come through on my-- what is that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a manticore head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently." They scratch their head, and shake their head in wonderment, "Well, you've-- (laughs) "Thank you. What do we call you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll get back to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're still a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is all very new.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're the TBDs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." The woman by the way, who you had helped earlier, she comes forward with two of the members, and they come forward to the Watchmaster and they say, "Bryce, Watchmaster, all "of these people came and helped my baby. And--" and turns and looks at you and is looking about to introduce you, if you have a moment you wish to halt or intercede.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I stop. I hold my hand up. I put my finger over my lips. Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other people are gathering and having reunions, other people are beginning to identify the dead that have been brought in the cart and while there is sadness and crying, there is also closure. There are even some still that are disappointed to not see those they had hoped to see amongst those who had been recovered. Given that still, a hero's night is to be prepared and people begin to prepare food. For a brief moment past the darkness, you can hear music begin to build as people begin to bring chairs and tables out to the center of the town square, the intersection of where Alfield's simple backwoods lifestyle seems to still understand what celebration is in the face of victory. As what better case is there to be but to celebrate those who stood up to such evils? As you all think over what you've done, this ragtag group of wandering know-nothings that have managed to come together and do a good thing. For some coin, maybe, but a good thing nonetheless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before I hand them over, I open the lid and I whisper in: Thadeus Candleglow says hello. I shut it. I think I did what he asked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said to do that. He said to say that to the people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They heard it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Caleb has been very distant for the last couple of hours, but absentmindedly scoops up Nott's hand. Doesn't look at Nott, but holds Nott's hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stealthily take my bag of coin and slide it into his back pocket, and I pat it and say: I got you some book money.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Everyone else is walking towards the village. The Duchess is perched on his shoulder, and he scrawling something in the dirt with that long reed. It's kind of an "H." And he fades into the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't get to say goodbye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the coolest

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Khary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Khary! That was amazing, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever played before?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: With my kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so epic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dude. Thank you, finally. We've been wanting to have you on for so long, but schedules haven't lined up. I'm so glad we could.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sometimes I can't believe my luck. I love the things people ask me to do and I can't believe I get to hang out with you guys and do this, this has been so much fun, I don't know how to thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pleasure is ours, man, thank you so much, seriously.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you inviting us on your show?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I have a gift! Is it all right if I--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a present?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I do have a present.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, sort of, from your old friend. Let's see I-- let's see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I was given something from Will Friedle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a venereal disease?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: At first he was like, "Oh, I've got something for you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slipping you the digits.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes, he brought me this 20-sided dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so pretty.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It is, it's lovely, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got gloves on him, don't touch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was up Will's butt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He carried it in his ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Crystallized rice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ass-20s, it's like ass pennies.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: My ass-- no. He played with this, apparently, but at some point, it was touched by Wil Wheaton.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Exactly. At some point, I had a hammer--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what we should do, because we don't want to do anything near the table, after this, we're going to go ahead and record a video of you dealing with that like the Ring in Mount Doom.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll put it up on socials.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: He gave this to me as if I would use it today. I was like, you know what, that's the last thing I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had it blessed and everything, you were telling me.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: He said that two witches blessed this thing and that it was okay. I watched him roll it, and it seemed like it was okay, but there's no way this thing can be okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's safer for everyone.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Rather than have any foolish soul wander upon it, we're going do with this thing, like you say, we're going to take this thing out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have that video for you guys in the near future. Guys, great game. We'll take this up next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe we survived.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're heroes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We lived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just for one day.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The plan was perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The plan was perfect. A couple things didn't work out to get out of there in time, I was hoping that would.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I was really disappointed in Nott for a while, and then she ran up there and did what no one else would.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Nott the Brave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott the Stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
